suppress.notes: This CVE affects all versions of JSON-java up to and excluding 20230227... and the project depends on a higher version
This CVE affects all versions of JGit up to and excluding 6.7.0.202309050840-r... and the project depends on a higher version
google-http-client-protobuf misidentified as protobuf-java, which is actually in non-vulnerable version
This affects the Go version of gRPC, leave the Java version alone please
